title: Improving Returns In 2022 By Staying In Step With Market Trends
description: Investor's Business Daily news editor Ed Carson and Alissa Coram, IBD's multimedia content editor, discuss lessons from this year's market and strategies for improving portfolio performance in 2022.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
